text: Rosemarie Müller-Streisand (11 August 1923 - 26 June 2020) was a German church historian, theologian and teacher. In 1963 she became a professor and in 1969 she was a main person of church history at the Humboldt University in Berlin. She retired in 1983. Müller-Streisand died in Berlin on 26 June 2020, aged 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German historians Category:German theologians Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Rosemarie Müller-Streisand
